text:
I think you are using my 15 year old account ID and PW to impersonate me to make account changes.
Would you mind please confirming?
Lots of moving pieces right now and I want to be sure we track who is acting as who when we access
monitoring data about each other.
Please let me know if I can help in any way as I offered to start the day. It’s important you learn what has been legally shared with each other.
Drawing conclusions based on the wrong data or incomplete information in our situation can lead to devastating consequences.
Message 504 of 4024
Odd you are logging on but not reading the message I sent. I think that is the only feature we use here. Should I be using something else? Thanks!

From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Re: Xfinity
Message 505 of 4024
I could not make the change as the instructions you provided to change from my computer did not work and by logging into the xfinity account
directly I was unable to change the Kirkland WiFi password.
I shared with you the conclusion I will need a separate Xfinity’s account under my name for the Kirkland house.

Message 506 of 4024
Christine-
That is not what I said to do. I can walk you through it. That is what I asked you to do from the start and you began discussing your laptop
connection which I had no idea why that was even relevant.
You can change it in 30 seconds if you meet me at our mailbox. I will give you my phone, sit in my car with windows rolled up, let you change it on
the spot, and then you hand my phone back.
Losing the diamond status will be expensive as hell. Just let me help you!
And btw- reviewing this thread does not show any instructions. Can I fix it with you?
